downloadTitle: Dynamics 365 for Talent extensibility solution: Integration with Office 365
downloadDescription: The Integration with Office 365, PowerAutomate app can be used to extract team information for signed-in users from Microsoft Office 365.

downloadFile.name: CDS Enity Storing Clock In Data imported from SQL.xlsx
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/c/9/4/c94fcbb7-af7f-4077-8f76-b0e24a3309b8/CDS Enity Storing Clock In Data imported from SQL.xlsx

detailsSection: The Integration with Office 365, PowerAutomate app can be used to extract team information for signed-in users from Microsoft Office 365. It references workers in Talent to extract clock-in and clock-out details and exception recordings. Clock-in and Clock-out details are stored in custom Common Data Service for Apps entities. The assumption is that these details are filled in from third-party systems via integration.
detailsSection_file_name: CDS Enity Storing Clock In Data imported from SQL.xlsx
installInstructionSection:
1. Click Download to download the file.
  2. Save the file to your computer.
  3. Files will then need to be extracted.
